There are a lot of things that happen to our bodies that are """"natural"""" for men and women. But instead of fighting governments to supply pads and tampons as a human right for women, she is fighting the pads and tampons themselves? The solution is not to go to the lowest denominator in hygiene, but to elevate those with less access by speading awareness for women's needs and making it a basic right. That's the bigger fight. Getting male-dominated governments to acknowledge this female basic need for hygiene.. not the other way around!!!
